verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%>, my sons <S%H1121><s%>, the instruction <S%H4148><s%> of a father <S%H1><s%>, And attend <S%H7181><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> understanding <S%H998><s%>:
For I give <S%H5414><s%> you good <S%H2896><s%> doctrine <S%H3948><s%>; Forsake <S%H5800><s%> ye not my law <S%H8451><s%>.
For I was a son <S%H1121><s%> unto my father <S%H1><s%>, Tender <S%H7390><s%> and only <S%H3173><s%> beloved in the sight <S%H6440><s%> of my mother <S%H517><s%>.

And he taught <S%H3384><s%> me <S%H559><s%>, and said unto me <S%H3820><s%>: Let thy heart retain <S%H8551><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%>; Keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and live <S%H2421><s%>;
Get <S%H7069><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, get <S%H7069><s%> understanding <S%H998><s%>; Forget <S%H7911><s%> not <S%H5186><s%>, neither decline from the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth <S%H6310><s%>;
Forsake <S%H5800><s%> her not <S%H8104><s%>, and she will preserve thee <S%H157><s%>; Love her <S%H5341><s%>, and she will keep thee.
Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is the principal thing <S%H7225><s%>; Therefore get <S%H7069><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>; Yea <S%H7075><s%>, with all thy getting get understanding <S%H998><s%>.
Exalt <S%H5549><s%> her <S%H7311><s%>, and she will promote thee <S%H3513><s%>; She will bring thee to honor, when thou dost embrace her <S%H2263><s%>.
She will give <S%H5414><s%> to thy head <S%H7218><s%> a chaplet <S%H3880><s%> of grace <S%H2580><s%>; A crown <S%H5850><s%> of beauty <S%H8597><s%> will she deliver to thee <S%H4042><s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%>, O my son <S%H1121><s%>, and receive <S%H3947><s%> my sayings <S%H561><s%>; And the years <S%H8141><s%> of thy life <S%H2416><s%> shall be many <S%H7235><s%>.
I have taught <S%H3384><s%> thee in the way <S%H1870><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%>; I have led <S%H1869><s%> thee in paths <S%H4570><s%> of uprightness <S%H3476><s%>.
When thou goest <S%H3212><s%>, thy steps <S%H6806><s%> shall not be straitened <S%H3334><s%>; And if thou runnest <S%H7323><s%>, thou shalt not stumble <S%H3782><s%>.
Take fast hold <S%H2388><s%> of instruction <S%H4148><s%>; Let her not go <S%H7503><s%>: Keep <S%H5341><s%> her <S%H2416><s%>; For she is thy life.
Enter <S%H935><s%> not into the path <S%H734><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, And walk <S%H833><s%> not in the way <S%H1870><s%> of evil men <S%H7451><s%>.
Avoid <S%H6544><s%> it <S%H5674><s%>, pass not by it <S%H7847><s%>; Turn from it <S%H5674><s%>, and pass on.
For they sleep <S%H3462><s%> not <S%H7489><s%>, except they do evil; And their sleep <S%H8142><s%> is taken away <S%H1497><s%>, unless they cause some to fall <S%H3782><s%>.
For they eat <S%H3898><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of wickedness <S%H7562><s%>, And drink <S%H8354><s%> the wine <S%H3196><s%> of violence <S%H2555><s%>.

But the path <S%H734><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is as the dawning <S%H5051><s%> light <S%H216><s%>, That shineth <S%H215><s%> more <S%H1980><s%> and more unto the perfect <S%H3559><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.
The way <S%H1870><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is as darkness <S%H653><s%>: They know <S%H3045><s%> not at what they stumble <S%H3782><s%>.
My son <S%H1121><s%>, attend <S%H7181><s%> to my words <S%H1697><s%>; Incline <S%H5186><s%> thine ear <S%H241><s%> unto my sayings <S%H561><s%>.
Let them not depart <S%H3868><s%> from thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>; Keep <S%H8104><s%> them in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thy heart <S%H3824><s%>.
For they are life <S%H2416><s%> unto those that find <S%H4672><s%> them <S%H4832><s%>, And health to all their flesh <S%H1320><s%>.
Keep <S%H5341><s%> thy heart <S%H3820><s%> with all diligence <S%H4929><s%>; For out of it are the issues <S%H8444><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>.
Put away <S%H5493><s%> from thee a wayward <S%H6143><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%>, And perverse <S%H3891><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> put far from thee <S%H7368><s%>.
Let thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> look <S%H5027><s%> right on <S%H5227><s%>, And let thine eyelids <S%H6079><s%> look straight before thee <S%H3474><s%>.
Make level the path <S%H4570><s%> of thy feet <S%H7272><s%>, And let all thy ways <S%H1870><s%> be established <S%H3559><s%>.
Turn <S%H5186><s%> not to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> nor to the left <S%H8040><s%>: Remove <S%H5493><s%> thy foot <S%H7272><s%> from evil <S%H7451><s%>.
